title: Crossroads
description:
The biker was leather, wind, muscles, and Alpha.
Christian Forker was a beautiful biker. And if I had my way, he was going to be mine.Â Jojo Valentine, biker princess, wants a beautiful biker of her own.Unfortunately, her father is Prez and her three brothers are members of The Dominion Brotherhood and act as a virtual chastity belt.Christian "Fork" Forker is a recently patched-over member who has shown he's not one to shy away from anything, even if people think he's a dick.Jojo wants him.There's a problem. For some reason, he refuses to acknowledge her existence.She's determined to get his attention. Book 4 of The Beautiful Biker Series:This smokin' hot MC romance series has suspense, steam, laughs, and tears. Sometimes the road to love is dangerous. And so worth it.
author: D.D. Prince
